channel.title: Srscp
channel.description:
I am here with something pretty big.. That I think most of you big private runescape servers would like or at least appreciate. I am not sure if I have posted here or not on the SRSCP but SRSCP is short for ShimmyShines Runescape Control Panel. I have finished most of it, all of it that I need to get done for testing. But now I need some people to go ahead and register on there, the first 3 people to sign up on here, ill make mods on there, so they can explore for bugs.
If you find any bugs you can report them in the bug webpage.
The example site is [url=http://24.144.125.25:2000/SRSCP/]here[/url]!
Registration is fairly simple. Its not complicated.
When I am fully finished with this project, I plan on having these things fully functional.
[ul][*]Full Login System(With extra features) [*]Administration Panel [*]Moderation Panel [*]Working Bug Center [*]Working Item Center [*]Working NPC Center [*]Very Easy installation[/ul]
I am also in need of suggestions. What could I do on here for suggestions?
The people who help me most will get a free copy of it, it does require SQL, and PHP.
For those poeple who just want one, but do not want to help at all, I will sell it to you, for $15 AD(American Dollars).
Thankyou for taking the time to read this, and if you do help out, for helping out.
ShimmyShine
PS: Mods if you signify this as an advertisement, please let this one pass, and ill give you free sites (Heh, a bribe - but please do not take it the wrong way).

item.title: Srscp
item.dc:creator: @ShimmyShine ShimmyShine
item.description:
@ShimmyShine wrote:

Im not sure what all is and isn’t… What I know is glitchy right now is when it shows your name at the bottom, if I have a gold crown… then so do you… But if I don’t, you don’t. So I am working on that, aside from that, everything SHOULD be good. but you never know.

Read full topic

no what i mean do u know when everything is fully functional?

Its not a server, its just a control panel… Its the website… Not the server… I need you to find all the bugs in it that you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Srscp

item.description:
@ShimmyShine wrote:

I gave credit to them for it all “ALL credit to runescape for design.”… I took no credit for the design… Now the login system, admin cp, etc… That is mine. and in no way violates there copyright…

Read full topic
